D3.js Colorpicker

Oct 31, 2018

In late November 2018 I made a color picker to explore the Hue-Saturation-Lightness color space with D3.js.

The Sunday Desk

I named this desk the Sunday because that was the day I woke up and designed and built it in one go.

MPCNC

May 20, 2018

Over the fall of 2017 I printed all of the parts needed to build Ryan Zellers’ excellent CNC machine design, the Mostly Printed CNC.

Ohio State CRP Research Thesis

May 6, 2017

My Honors Research Thesis was the culmination of my academic career in City & Regional Planning at Ohio State. I investigated how environmental assets like greenspace and tree canopy coverage correlated with existing data on spatial inequality in Columbus put together by The Kirwan Institute, called the Opportunity Index.

Cajon Drum

Mar 1, 2017

I built this cajon, or box drum, in the spring of 2018 for my girlfriend Emily.

Family Calendar in D3.js

Dec 27, 2016

I built a calendar tool using D3.js to help remember upcoming birthdays in my big family.
